author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #38971

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_4_X`.

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2412](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2412): [PPS] separate Stream+PD for AlCaPPS Express and Prompt
  - [CMSHLT-2414](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2414): [TRK] increased size of the PixelDigis buffer (GPU reco)
  - [CMSHLT-2409](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2409): [TSG] increased smart-PS of Scouting Path in ScoutingPFMonitor PD to 1000
  - [CMSHLT-2416](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2416): [BPH] split ParkingSingleMuon PD and Stream by 3
  - [CMSHLT-2422](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2422): [TSG] add missing `*TrackPacker` product to `hltEventContentParkingScoutingMonitor`
  - [CMSHLT-2424](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2424): [HIG] uniform prescales for PNET control triggers
  - [CMSHLT-2417](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2417): [L1T] added L1T cross-seeds with lower MET thresholds
  - [CMSHLT-2250](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2250): [PFlow] use depth-based Phase-1 thresholds for HBHE PFRecHits
  - [CMSHLT-2312](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2312) (part 1): [MUO] update of muon HCAL-isolation working-point
  - [CMSHLT-2418](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2418) (part 1): [EXO] disabled `HLT_PFMET110_PFJet100_v` (PS=0)

This latest GRun menu requires the latest L1T menu, i.e. [`L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0`](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/blob/550121d3ea20a0c3d29222304836f10aabb3d3cc/development/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0.html). It also includes a fix to the ParticleFlow reconstruction, which required an update of the HLT Jet/MET calibrations (see #38916).

This PR does not require a backport of #38916, because the HLT menu used in RelVal wfs in `12_4_X` is the frozen HLT-V1.2 menu for 2022 (to be used for Run-3 MC production).

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#38971

Development of HLT menus for 2022 pp data-taking.
title: HLT menu development for `12_4_X` (6/N)
